displayName.brazilian: Rei da Lua & Rainha do Sol
displayName.french: Roi de la Lune et reine du Soleil

description.brazilian: Você conheceu Erevan & Zerille.
description.english: You met Erevan & Zerille.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Érévan et Zérille.
description.latam: Conociste a Erevan y Zerille.
description.russian: Вы познакомились с Ереваном и Зерилль.
description.schinese: 你遇到了埃雷文和泽莱勒
description.turkish: Erevan & Zerille ile tanıştın.

description.brazilian: Você conheceu Idril.
description.english: You met Idril.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Idril
description.latam: Conociste a Idril.
description.russian: Вы встретили Идриль.
description.schinese: 你遇到了伊德利尔
description.turkish: Idril ile tanıştın.

description.brazilian: Você conheceu Morwen.
description.english: You met Morwen,
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Morwen
description.latam: Conociste a Morwen.
description.russian: Вы встретили Морвен.
description.schinese: 你遇到了莫尔文
description.turkish: Morwen ile tanıştın.

description.brazilian: Você alimentou um lobo faminto antes que fosse tarde demais.
description.english: You fed a hungry wolf before it was too late.
description.french: Vous avez nourri une louve affamée avant qu'il ne soit trop tard
description.latam: Alimentaste a un lobo hambriento antes de que fuera demasiado tarde.
description.russian: Вы накормили голодного волка, пока не стало слишком поздно.
description.schinese: 你及时喂饱了一只饥饿的狼
description.turkish: Aç bir kurdu çok geç olmadan besledin.

description.brazilian: Você se alimentou de Kali & Naya.
description.english: You fed on Kali & Naya.
description.french: Vous vous êtes abreuvé sur Kali et Naya
description.latam: Te alimentaste de Kali y Naya.
description.russian: Вы кормились Кали и Найей.
description.schinese: 你让卡莉和娜亚心满意足
description.turkish: Kali & Naya'yı besledin.

description.brazilian: Você teve seu primeiro encontro sexual com Idril.
description.english: You had your first sexual encounter with Idril.
description.french: Vous avez eu vos premiers rapports sexuels avec Idril
description.latam: Tuviste tu primer encuentro sexual con Idril.
description.russian: У вас был первый сексуальный контакт с Идриль.
description.schinese: 你第一次和伊德利尔亲热
description.turkish: Idril ile ilk seks deneyimini yaşadın.

displayName.brazilian: A Segunda Vez é que Dá Sorte?
displayName.french: La deuxième fois est la bonne ?

description.brazilian: Você visitou Nysserine pela segunda vez.
description.english: You visited Nysserine for a second time.
description.french: Vous vous êtes rendu à Nysserine pour la deuxième fois
description.latam: Visitaste Nysserine por segunda vez.
description.russian: Вы посетили Найсерин во второй раз.
description.schinese: 你第二次到访尼瑟琳
description.turkish: Nysserine'i ikinci kez ziyaret ettin.

description.brazilian: Você teve seu primeiro encontro sexual com Morwen.
description.english: You had your first sexual encounter with Morwen.
description.french: Vous avez eu vos premiers rapports sexuels avec Morwen
description.latam: Tuviste tu primer encuentro sexual con Morwen.
description.russian: У вас был первый сексуальный контакт с Морвен.
description.schinese: 你第一次和莫尔文亲热
description.turkish: Morwen ile ilk seks deneyimini yaşadın.

description.brazilian: Leyala se alimentou do seu sangue quando ela não estava bem.
description.english: Leyala fed on your blood when she was unwell.
description.french: Leyala a bu de votre sang lorsqu'elle s'est sentie faible
description.latam: Leyala se alimentó de tu sangre cuando no se encontraba bien.
description.russian: Лейала питалась вашей кровью.
description.schinese: 莱亚拉身体不适时吸食了你的血液
description.turkish: Leyala hasta olduğunda kanını emdi.

description.brazilian: Você procurou a ajuda de Kagome.
description.english: You sought aid from Kagome.
description.french: Vous avez demandé de l'aide à Kagome
description.latam: Buscaste la ayuda de Kagome.
description.russian: Вы обратились за помощью к Кагоме.
description.schinese: 你向戈薇求助
description.turkish: Kagome'den yardım istedin.

description.brazilian: Você procurou a ajuda de Seraphina.
description.english: You sought aid from Seraphina.
description.french: Vous avez demandé de l'aide à Séraphina
description.latam: Buscaste la ayuda de Serafina.
description.russian: Вы обратились за помощью к Серафине.
description.schinese: 你向瑟拉菲娜求助
description.turkish: Seraphina'dan yardım istedin.

description.brazilian: Você conheceu Aseem.
description.english: You met Aseem.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Aseem
description.latam: Conociste a Aseem.
description.russian: Вы встретили Асим.
description.schinese: 你遇到了阿希姆
description.turkish: Aseem ile tanıştın.

description.brazilian: Você capturou Nawen.
description.english: You apprehended Nawen.
description.french: Vous avez arrêté Nawen
description.latam: Detuviste a Nawen.
description.russian: Вы задержали Навьен.
description.schinese: 你逮捕了纳文
description.turkish: Nawen'i yakaladın.

description.brazilian: Você se ofereceu para ajudar Morwen.
description.english: You offered to help Morwen.
description.french: Vous avez proposé votre aide à Morwen
description.latam: Te ofreciste a ayudar a Morwen.
description.russian: Вы предложили помощь Морвен.
description.schinese: 你答应帮莫尔文
description.turkish: Morwen'e yardım teklif ettin.

description.brazilian: Você descobriu sobre a ordem que age contra você.
description.english: You learnt about the order moving against you.
description.french: Vous avez découvert l'existence d'une organisation cherchant à vous nuire
description.latam: Se enteró de la orden en su contra.
description.russian: Вы узнали о том, что орден действует против вас.
description.schinese: 你了解到对你不利的组织
description.turkish: Sana karşı harekete geçen örgütü öğrendin.

description.brazilian: Você ficou do lado de Kali durante o conflito dela com Yuki.
description.english: You sided with Kali during her conflict with Yuki.
description.french: Vous avez pris la défense de Kali lors du conflit l'opposant à Yuki
description.latam: Te pusiste del lado de Kali durante su conflicto con Yuki.
description.russian: Вы встали на сторону Кали во время её конфликта с Юки.
description.schinese: 在卡莉与有希发生冲突时，你站在了卡莉一边
description.turkish: Yuki ile olan çatışmasında Kali'nin yanında yer aldın.

description.brazilian: Você ficou do lado de Yuki durante o conflito dela com Kali.
description.english: You sided with Yuki during her conflict with Kali.
description.french: Vous avez pris la défense de Yuki lors du conflit l'opposant à Kali
description.latam: Te pusiste del lado de Yuki durante su conflicto con Kali.
description.russian: Вы встали на сторону Юки во время её конфликта с Кали.
description.schinese: 在卡莉与有希发生冲突时，你站在了有希一边
description.turkish: Kali ile olan çatışmasında Yuki'nin yanında yer aldın.

description.brazilian: Você encontrou uma câmara secreta no Palácio Élfico.
description.english: You located a secret chamber in the Elven Palace.
description.french: Vous avez localisé une pièce secrète dans le palais des elfes.
description.latam: Localizaste una cámara secreta en el Palacio de los Elfos.
description.russian: Вы обнаружили секретную комнату в эльфийском дворце.
description.schinese: 你找到了精灵王宫的秘密房间
description.turkish: Elf Sarayı'nda gizli bir oda buldun.

description.brazilian: Você capturou Aseem.
description.english: You apprehended Aseem.
description.french: Vous avez arrêté Aseem.
description.latam: Detuviste a Aseem.
description.russian: Вы задержали Асима.
description.schinese: 你逮捕了阿希姆
description.turkish: Aseem'i yakaladın.

description.brazilian: Você curou os Elfos da Lua com a ajuda de Seraphina.
description.english: You cured the Moon Elves with Seraphina's help.
description.french: Vous avez guéri les elfes de la Lune avec l'aide de Séraphina.
description.latam: Curaste a los Elfos Lunares con la ayuda de Serafina.
description.russian: Вы вылечили лунных эльфов с помощью Серафины.
description.schinese: 你在瑟拉菲娜的帮助下治好了月精灵
description.turkish: Seraphina'nın yardımıyla Ay Elflerini iyileştirdin.

description.brazilian: Você colocou os Elfos da Lua de Nysserine em quarentena.
description.english: You quarantined the Moon Elves of Nysserine.
description.french: Vous avez mis les elfes de la Lune de Nysserine en quarantaine.
description.latam: Pusiste en cuarentena a los Elfos Lunares de Nysserine.
description.russian: Вы поместили лунных эльфов Ниссерина в карантин.
description.schinese: 你隔离了尼瑟琳的月精灵
description.turkish: Nysserine'in Ay Elflerini karantinaya aldın.

description.brazilian: Você impediu brutalmente a propagação da praga.
description.english: You brutally prevented the spread of the plague.
description.french: Vous avez empêché la propagation de l'épidémie de façon brutale.
description.latam: Impediste brutalmente la propagación de la plaga.
description.russian: Вы жестоко предотвратили распространение чумы.
description.schinese: 你以残忍的方式阻止了瘟疫传播
description.turkish: Salgının yayılmasını vahşice engelledin.

description.brazilian: Você e Kali declararam seu amor um pelo outro (romântico ou platônico).
description.english: You and Kali declared your love for each other (romantic or platonic).
description.french: Kali et vous vous êtes professé votre amour (romantique ou platonique).
description.latam: Kali y tú declararon su amor mutuo (romántico o platónico).
description.russian: Вы и Кали признались друг другу в любви (романтической или платонической).
description.schinese: 你和卡莉互诉爱意（浪漫或柏拉图式）
description.turkish: Sen ve Kali birbirinize olan aşkınızı ilan ettiniz (romantik veya platonik).

description.brazilian: Você completou todos os capítulos disponíveis em High Lathión.
description.english: You completed all chapters available in High Lathión.
description.french: Vous êtes arrivé à bout de tous les chapitres disponibles dans Haut Lathión.
description.latam: Has completado todos los capítulos disponibles en Alto Latión.
description.russian: Вы завершили все главы, доступные в Высоком Латионе.
description.schinese: 你完成了拉菲恩圣地的所有章节
description.turkish: High Lathión'daki tüm bölümleri tamamladın.

description.brazilian: Você e Gina procuraram ajuda para Timeo com as bruxas.
description.english: You and Gina sought help for Timeo from the witches.
description.french: Tu as cherché de l'aide auprès des sorcières pour aider Timéo.
description.latam: Tú y Gina buscaron ayuda para Timeo con las brujas.
description.russian: Вы с Джиной искали помощи у ведьм.
description.schinese: 你和吉娜向女巫寻求帮助，帮助蒂梅奥
description.turkish: Sen ve Gina, Timeo için cadılardan yardım istediniz.

description.brazilian: Você e Gina procuraram ajuda para Timeo com os demônios.
description.english: You and Gina sought help for Timeo from the demons.
description.french: Tu as cherché de l'aide auprès des démons pour aider Timéo.
description.latam: Tú y Gina buscaron ayuda para Timeo con  los demonios.
description.russian: Вы с Джиной искали помощи у демонов.
description.schinese: 你和吉娜向恶魔寻求帮助，帮助蒂梅奥
description.turkish: Sen ve Gina, Timeo için iblislerden yardım istediniz.

description.brazilian: Você se deixou ser levado por Kagome em seus complexos assuntos de família.
description.english: You let Kagome pull you into her complex family matters.
description.french: Tu t'es laissé entraîner dans les histoires de familles compliquées de Kagomé.
description.latam: Dejaste que Kagome te metiera en sus complejos asuntos familiares.
description.russian: Кагоме втянула вас в её сложные семейные дела.
description.schinese: 你被戈薇卷入了她的复杂家事中
description.turkish: Kagome'nin seni karmaşık aile meselelerine çekmesine izin verdin.

description.brazilian: Você ajudou Yuki a expandir seu paladar.
description.english: You helped Yuki expand her palate.
description.french: Tu as aidé Yuki à étendre son palais gustatif.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Yuki a expandir su paladar.
description.russian: Вы помогли Юки расширить её вкус.
description.schinese: 你帮助有希拓展味觉
description.turkish: Yuki'nin damak zevkini genişletmesine yardım ettin.

description.brazilian: Seraphina te indicou Ba'el para ajudar Timeo.
description.english: Seraphina pointed you towards Ba'el to help Timeo.
description.french: Séraphina vous a conseillé de vous adresser à Ba'el pour aider Timéo.
description.latam: Seraphina te señaló hacia Ba'el para ayudar a Timeo.
description.russian: Серафина направила вас к Баэлю, чтобы помочь Тимео.
description.schinese: 瑟拉菲娜指引你去找巴尔，帮助蒂梅奥
description.turkish: Seraphina, Timeo'ya yardım etmesi için seni Ba'el'e yönlendirdi.

description.brazilian: Ba'el conseguiu a ajuda de uma bruxa para Timeo.
description.english: Ba'el procured the help of a witch for Timeo.
description.french: Ba'el a fait appel à une sorcière pour aider Timéo.
description.latam: Ba'el consiguió la ayuda de una bruja para Timeo.
description.russian: Баэль заручился помощью ведьмы для Тимео.
description.schinese: 为了蒂梅奥，巴尔寻求了女巫的援助
description.turkish: Ba'el, Timeo için bir cadının yardımını sağladı.

description.brazilian: Você ajudou Kagome a subjugar Meli.
description.english: You helped Kagome subdue Meli.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Kagome à maîtriser Meli.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Kagome a someter a Meli.
description.russian: Вы помогли Кагоме покорить Мели.
description.schinese: 你帮助戈薇制服了梅利
description.turkish: Kagome'nin Meli'yi alt etmesine yardım ettin.

description.brazilian: Kali te contou sobre o livro dela.
description.english: Kali told you about her book.
description.french: Kali vous a parlé de son roman.
description.latam: Kali te habló de su libro.
description.russian: Кали рассказала вам о своей книге.
description.schinese: 卡莉跟你说起了她的书
description.turkish: Kali sana kitabından bahsetti.

description.brazilian: Você convenceu Leyala a ir ao casamento da amiga dela.
description.english: You convinced Leyala to attend her friend's wedding.
description.french: Vous avez convaincu Leyala d'assister au mariage de son amie.
description.latam: Convenciste a Leyala para asistir a la boda de su amiga.
description.russian: Вы убедили Лейалу пойти на свадьбу своей подруги.
description.schinese: 你成功说服莱亚拉去参加她朋友的婚礼
description.turkish: Leyala'yı arkadaşının düğününe katılması için ikna ettin.

description.brazilian: Leyala compartilhou com você as preocupações dela sobre ver as pessoas que faziam bullying com ela.
description.english: Leyala shared her concerns with you about seeing her bullies.
description.french: Leyala vous a confié être inquiète de revoir ceux qui l'ont tyrannisée.
description.latam: Leyala te compartió su preocupación por ver a sus matones.
description.russian: Лейала поделилась с вами своими переживаниями по поводу встречи с хулиганами.
description.schinese: 莱亚拉向你倾诉了她看到往日霸凌者时的担忧
description.turkish: Leyala, zorbalarını görmekle ilgili endişelerini seninle paylaştı.

description.brazilian: Você visitou a China com Mei e Ling Guo.
description.english: You visited China with Mei & Ling Guo.
description.french: Vous avez visité la Chine avec Mei et Ling Guo.
description.latam: Visitaste China con Mei y Ling Guo.
description.russian: Вы посетили Китай с Мэй и Линь Гоу.
description.schinese: 你和梅、凌帼一起访问中国
description.turkish: Mei ve Ling Guo ile Çin'i ziyaret ettin.

description.brazilian: Naya compartilhou com você que o avô dela não está bem.
description.english: Naya shared with you that her grandfather is unwell.
description.french: Naya vous a confié que son grand-père était souffrant.
description.latam: Naya te compartió que su abuelo no se encuentra bien.
description.russian: Найя рассказала вам, что её дедушка плохо себя чувствует.
description.schinese: 娜亚跟你说起她的爷爷身体抱恙
description.turkish: Naya, büyükbabasının hasta olduğunu seninle paylaştı.

description.brazilian: Você acompanhou Naya até a Noruega.
description.english: You accompanied Naya to Norway.
description.french: Vous avez accompagné Naya en Norvège.
description.latam: Acompañaste a Naya a Noruega.
description.russian: Вы пошли с Найей в Норвегию.
description.schinese: 你陪同娜亚去挪威
description.turkish: Naya'ya Norveç'e kadar eşlik ettin.

description.brazilian: Você ofereceu apoio a Seraphina no novo papel dela.
description.english: You offered Seraphina support in her new role.
description.french: Vous avez proposé votre soutien à Séraphina dans son nouveau rôle.
description.latam: Ofreciste apoyo a Seraphina en su nuevo rol.
description.russian: Вы предложили Серафине свою помощь в её новой роли.
description.schinese: 你帮助瑟拉菲娜适应她的新职责
description.turkish: Seraphina'ya yeni rolünde destek teklif ettin.

description.brazilian: Você alistou a ajuda da Tasha para encontrar Cain.
description.english: You enlisted Tasha's help to find Cain.
description.french: Vous avez demandé à Tasha de vous aider à retrouver Caïn.
description.latam: Solicitaste la ayuda de Tasha para encontrar a Caín.
description.russian: Вы обратились к Таше за помощью в поиске Каина.
description.schinese: 你请求塔莎帮忙寻找凯恩
description.turkish: Cain'i bulmak için Tasha'nın yardımını istedin.

description.brazilian: Tasha se abriu sobre seu relacionamento com Cain.
description.english: Tasha opened up about her relationship with Cain.
description.french: Tasha vous a parlé de sa relation avec Caïn.
description.latam: Tasha habló sobre su relación con Cain.
description.russian: Таша рассказала о своих отношениях с Каином.
description.schinese: 塔莎坦诚地说明了她与凯恩的关系
description.turkish: Tasha, Cain ile olan ilişkisi hakkında açıldı.

description.brazilian: Você ajudou Yuki a experimentar algumas roupas novas.
description.english: You helped Yuki try on some new outfits.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Yuki à essayer de nouvelles tenues.
description.latam: Ayudaste a Yuki a probarse algunos conjuntos nuevos.
description.russian: Вы помогли Юки примерить несколько новых нарядов.
description.schinese: 你帮助有希试穿新衣服
description.turkish: Yuki'nin yeni kıyafetler denemesine yardım ettin.

description.brazilian: Você acompanhou Zyair até o bar.
description.english: You accompanied Zyair to the bar.
description.french: Vous avez accompagné Zyair au bar.
description.latam: Acompañaste a Zyair al bar.
description.russian: Вы сходили с Зяиром в бар.
description.schinese: 你陪同泽亚尔去酒吧
description.turkish: Zyair'e bara kadar eşlik ettin.
